page.title: 14Flinton Hill Farm
page.content: My dad works on this farm. His day starts at 8am and he works till 4.30pm. He has half an hour dinner break. During the{harvest} he sometimes works for 21 hours a day. I don't see him very much at this time of the year but he gets better wages. Most of the land is used for{crops.} This year wheat, barley and rape seed have been grown. Other fields have been used for 24 cows. These will later be sold for beef. The vet comes to check the cows for diseases. I help him put them in the trap while he takes blood samples. There are five barns in the farmyard some are used for storing corn, straw and hay. Others are used for garaging tractors, diggers, cultivators and fork lift trucks. Sometimes I enjoy playing on the broken down tractor,but most of the time it's a lonely life.
